title: Chats, naps, crashes, and relegations: Inside the ‘most boring stage at the Tour de France’
content:
The irony is that quite a bit happened in the four-hour snoozer, but it was all packed into the final chaotic 10km.

Read the full article at Chats, naps, crashes, and relegations: Inside the ‘most boring stage at the Tour de France’ on Velo.
author: ahood
